MQTTReceiver module¶

class MQTTReceiver.MQTTReceiver[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is an example implementation of a MQTT Receiver which receives and handles the transmitted data.

broker = 'broker.emqx.io'¶
client_id = 'client-5636'¶
connect_mqtt()[source]¶

This function creates a connection to the MQTT Broker.

Returns

a client instance

discover()[source]¶

This function is used for the discovery phase on the start of the game, so each robot gets his virtual id.

discover_topic = 'discover'¶
general_topic = 'general'¶
id_received = False¶
port = 1883¶
subscribe()[source]¶

This function handles the main logic of the receiver and prints out the according event for the robot.

topic = ''¶
MQTTReceiver.execute_command(msg, event_type)[source]¶

This method executes the received command and currently only is reacting to a MovementEvent.

Param

msg: the decoded message containing game info

Param

event_type: the given event type
